feed.title: HenryArnold’s Blog
feed.subtitle: 为找到那片海不顾一切

entry.title: 单车
entry.content:
陈奕迅 (Eason Chan) 词：黄伟文

不要不要假设我知道 ba yiu ba yiu ga ci o zi dou

一切一切也都是为我而做 ya cai ya cai ya dou si wai o yi zou

为何这么伟大 wai ho ze mo wai dai

如此感觉不到 yu ci gan go ba dou

不说一句的爱有多好？ ba su ya geoi di oi you do hou

只有一次记得实在接触到… zi you ya ci gei da sa zoi zi cu dou

骑着单车的我俩 gei zu dan ce di o loeng

怀紧贴背的拥抱 wai gan ti bui di yong pou

难离难舍想抱紧些 nan lei nan se soeng pou gan se

茫茫人生好象荒野 mong mong yan sang hou zoeng fong ye

如孩儿能伏于爸爸的肩膊 yu hoi yi nang fu yu ba ba di gin bo

谁要下车 seio yiu ha ce

难离难舍总有一些 nan lei na se zong you ya se

常情如此不可堆卸 soeng cing yu ci ba ho teoi se

任世间再冷酷 yan sai gan zoi lang hu

想起这单车还有幸福可惜 soeng hei ze dan ce wan you hang fu ho ze

任世间怨我坏 yan sai gan yun o wai

可知我只得你承受我的狂或野 ho zi o zi da nei sing sou o di kwong wa ye

经已给我怎会看不到? ging yi ka o zan wu hon ba dou

虽说演你角色实在有难度 seoi su yin nei go si sa zoi you nan dou

从来虚位以待 cong loi heoi wai yi doi

何不给个拥抱？ ho ba ka go yong pou

想我怎去相信这一套 soeng o zan heoi soeng seon ze ya tou

多疼惜我却不便让我知道 do tong si o koe ba pin yoeng o zi dou

怀念单车给你我 wai nin dan ce ka nei o

唯一有过的拥抱 wai ya you guo di yong pou

难离难舍想抱紧些 nan lei nan se soeng pou gan se

茫茫人生好象荒野 mong mong yan sang hou zoeng fong ye

如孩儿能伏于爸爸的肩膊 yu hoi yi nang fu yu ba ba di gin bo

哪怕遥遥长路多斜 na pa yiu yiu coeng lou do ce

你爱我爱多些 nei oi o oi do se

让我他朝走得坚壮些 yoeng o ta ziu zou da gin zong se

你介意来爱护 nei gai loi oi wu

又靠谁施舍 you kou seoi si se
entry.summary: 陈奕迅 (Eason Chan) 词：黄伟文

entry.title: 生活不止眼前的苟且
entry.content:
词曲:高晓松

演唱:许巍

妈妈坐在门前

哼着花儿与少年

虽已时隔多年

记得那时她泪水涟涟

那些幽暗的时光

那些坚持与慌张

在临别的门前

妈妈望着我说

生活不止眼前的苟且

还有诗和远方的田野

你赤手空拳来到人世间

为找到那片海不顾一切

她坐在我对面

低头说珍重再见

虽已时隔多年

记得那时她泪水涟涟

那些欢笑的时光

那些誓言与梦想

在分手的街边

她紧抱着我说

生活不止眼前的苟且

还有诗和远方的田野

你赤手空拳来到人世间

为找到那片海不顾一切

我独自渐行渐远

膝下多了个少年

少年一天天长大

有一天要离开家

看着他背影的成长

看他坚持与回望

我知道有一天

我会笑着对他说

生活不止眼前的苟且

还有诗和远方的田野

你赤手空拳来到人世间

为找到那片海不顾一切

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.
